00027                                     {
00028         if(INI->ReadString("Graphics.Advanced", "DirectX.Force", Ares::readDefval, Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00029                 if(!_strcmpi(Ares::readBuffer, "hardware")) {
00030                         GFX_DX_Force = GFX_DX_HW;
00031                 } else if(!_strcmpi(Ares::readBuffer, "emulation")) {
00032                         GFX_DX_Force = GFX_DX_EM;
00033                 }
00034         }
00035         if(Ares::RunningOnWindows7OrVista()) {
00036                 GFX_DX_Force = 0;
00037         }
00038 
00039 #define ReadSurface(__surface__) \
00040         if(INI->ReadString("Graphics.Advanced", "Surface." str(__surface__) ".Memory", Ares::readDefval, Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) { \
00041                 if(!_strcmpi(Ares::readBuffer, "VRAM")) { \
00042                         GFX_S_ ## __surface__ .Memory = GFX_SU_VRAM; \
00043                 } else if(!_strcmpi(Ares::readBuffer, "System")) { \
00044                         GFX_S_ ## __surface__ .Memory = GFX_SU_SYSTEM; \
00045                 } \
00046         } \
00047         if(INI->ReadString("Graphics.Advanced", "Surface." str(__surface__) ".Force3D", Ares::readDefval, Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) { \
00048          bool F3D = INI->ReadBool("Graphics.Advanced", "Surface." str(__surface__) ".Force3D", false); \
00049          GFX_S_ ## __surface__ .Force3D = F3D ? 1 : 0;\
00050         }
00051 
00052         ReadSurface(Alternate);
00053         ReadSurface(Composite);
00054         ReadSurface(Hidden);
00055         ReadSurface(Hidden_2);
00056         ReadSurface(Primary);
00057         ReadSurface(Sidebar);
00058         ReadSurface(Tile);

00068                                     {
